ListPreference.android:summary: Which installed voice to use for Text-to-Speech (TTS).

ListPreference.android:title: Number of Columns
ListPreference.android:summary: The number of columns of buttons to display. The more columns, the smaller the buttons.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Full Screen
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable this option to hide the notification bar. Untick this (for example) if you're using a device that lacks physical buttons, and need to leave an on-screen nav bar visible.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save TTS to Files
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable this option to save text-to-speech utterances to sound files. Improves smoothness of playback on slower devices, but requires storage space.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Scale Text Width
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable this option to scale the width of text to fill each button.
